an5.18:4.1: “Pañcahi, bhikkhave, dhammehi samannāgato bhikkhu parahitāya paṭipanno hoti, no attahitāya.
an5.18:4.3: Idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu attanā na sīlasampanno hoti, paraṃ sīlasampadāya samādapeti;
an5.18:4.4: attanā na samādhisampanno hoti, paraṃ samādhisampadāya samādapeti;
an5.18:4.5: attanā na paññāsampanno hoti, paraṃ paññāsampadāya samādapeti;
an5.18:4.6: attanā na vimuttisampanno hoti, paraṃ vimuttisampadāya samādapeti;
an5.18:4.7: attanā na vimuttiñāṇadassanasampanno hoti, paraṃ vimuttiñāṇadassanasampadāya samādapeti.
an5.18:4.8: Imehi kho, bhikkhave, pañcahi dhammehi samannāgato bhikkhu parahitāya paṭipanno hoti, no attahitāyā”ti.
